alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 4:26PM MST until August 01 at 5:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coconino County west of Page, Arizona... * Until 515 PM MST. * At 423 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wahweap, or near Page, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...55-60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated and observation near Page. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Page, Lees Ferry, and Wahweap. This includes the following highways... State Route 98 between mile markers 548 and 549. U.S. Highway 89 between mile markers 543 and 556. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If on or near Lake Powell, get away from the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 15 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
